title: Topic 004 Question 009
body: You have a report in Power BI named report1 that is based on a shared dataset.
You need to minimize the risk of data exfiltration for report. The solution must prevent other reports from being affected.
options: Clear Allow recipients to share your dashboard and Allow users to build new content using the underlying datasets for the dataset.
Apply row-level security (RLS) to the shared dataset.
Select the Allow end users to export both summarized and underlying data from the service or Report Server Export data option for the report.
Select the Don't allow end users to export any data from the service or Report Server Export data option for the report.
